name: Slither Wizard
description:
Like snakes? Bullet hells? Do you also envision yourself trapped in a wizards tower of your own creation fighting aggressive trespassing bugs on a mission for pure chaos, all while battling to regain full control of your split self? Then play our game! It’s not better than a therapist, but it IS free. 

     Test your ambidexterity and get through all waves of enemies as fast as you can, Slither Wizards may have all the time in their world, but who wants to spend time taking out the trash?

     WASD and IJKL for left and right brain control, F and H to split further and create two extra confused consciousnesses for max offensive power. Come to terms with yourself and reconnect your bodies to regain full control of your true being.

CREDITS:

Programming: RealTealTea
Music and Sound: TesaBunny
Backgrounds: TesaBunny
Character Design and Animation: BigSchmike
